Articles.Content:
Simple! Give an outline of a Pokemon (Or just a random shape) and let the next poster fill it in to make it what ever pokemon you want! You have to make a new outline after that, thought. 

Ex.

Poster 1: It's a Treeko!

\*Posts filled in outline\*

\*Posts another outline\*

Poster 2: It's Yveltal!

\*Posts filled in outline\*

\*Posts another outline\*

Rules:

No suggestive or explicit content (obviously)

Make an original outline (MS Paint, Paper, and any drawing software) and original filled in outline

I'll will start: 

WHOS DAT POKEMON

![VUR0xHY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VUR0xHY.jpg)
